documentation.text:
@title Monitor
 @notice Monitor Interface
@notice Only allow initialization once.
@notice Vision ERC777 token contract.
@notice Total supply of Vision. Note this needs to start with 1 for minting.
@notice Total StakeToken in Vision Pool. Note this needs to start with 1 for minting.
@notice Stake token for Vision pool.
@notice Foresight token ERC1155 contract that manages all Foresight.

@notice Mint a new amount of Foresight Tokens for the given address.
 @param _stakeToken Address of the allowed stakeToken for Vision.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Contract can only be initialized once."

arguments.value: Contract can only be initialized once.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Contract can only be initialized once."

documentation.text: @notice Deploys Vision vault, Foresight tokens, and RealityMarket.
@notice Event capturing minted vision, cost, and address.
@notice Event capturing burned vision, cost, and address.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Total Stake In Vision Vault must be greater than 1."

arguments.value: Total Stake In Vision Vault must be greater than 1.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Total Stake In Vision Vault must be greater than 1."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Minted Vision must be greater than 1."

arguments.value: Minted Vision must be greater than 1.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Minted Vision must be greater than 1."

documentation.text: @notice return details of the newly created reality market.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Market end time cannot be in the past."

arguments.value: Market end time cannot be in the past.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Market end time cannot be in the past."

documentation.text: @notice Event capturing minted foresight, stake, and address.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount to mint should be greater than 0."

arguments.value: Amount to mint should be greater than 0.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount to mint should be greater than 0."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Market outcome selection does not match market index outcomes."

arguments.value: Market outcome selection does not match market index outcomes.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Market outcome selection does not match market index outcomes."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Vision cost should be greater than 0."

arguments.value: Vision cost should be greater than 0.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Vision cost should be greater than 0."

documentation.text: @notice Event to finalize a market.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Market has not reached End Time."

arguments.value: Market has not reached End Time.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Market has not reached End Time."

documentation.text: @notice Event to convert foresight into vision.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "User has no stake in the winning outcome."

arguments.value: User has no stake in the winning outcome.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "User has no stake in the winning outcome."
